companies.name: ALLSIDES
companies.description: ALLSIDES, formerly Covision Media, is a cutting-edge A.I. technology company specializing in high-performance 3D scanning. Our revolutionary 3D scanners can automatically convert any physical object into a reality-grade and relightable 3D digital twin in a matter of minutes. The scanner is trusted by leading brands in the industry, including Inditex Group (Zara, Massimo Dutti, Bershka etc), Meta, adidas and NUREG, GORE-Tex, La Sportiva, and other top-tier tech and e-commerce companies, to mass-produce tens of thousands of reality-grade 3D assets. These assets are ideal for a wide range of applications, including Virtual Try-On, 2D virtual product photography, 3D e-commerce, and video from 3D.
companies.categories: 3D Graphics, 3D Modeling, 3D Scanning, Artifical Intelligence (AI), Data Visualization, Game Engines, High Resolution Technologies, Rendering & Modeling
